column2: "Afei Jesus  hun dɛ Farisiifo no atse dɛ ɔno Jesus rinya esuafo pii na orunuma nyimpa sen John no"
column3: "#4.1 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom ka dɛ: Ewuradze."

column2: "(naaso Jesus nankasa ennuma na n’esuafo a)
column4: "ofii Judea na osii mu kɔr Galilii bio."

column2: "Nna otwar dɛ ɔfa Samaria."
"Na afei okodur Samaria kurow bi a wɔfrɛ no Sikaar a ɔbɛn asaase a Jakob dze kyɛɛ ne ba Josef no ho;"
"nna Jakob bura so wɔ hɔ. Nna Jesus aberɛ wɔ n’akwantu mu ntsi
column3: ɔtsenaa bura no do dɛmara; bɛyɛ ewiaber duebien no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa bi a ofi Samaria bae bɔtoow nsu. Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Ma me bi monnom."

column2: "(Nna n’esuafo no kɔ kurow mu rokɔtɔ edziban.)"
"Na Samarianyi ɔbaa no see no dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn na ɔwo a eyɛ Jewnyi ibisa emi a meyɛ Samarianyi ɔbaa hɔ nsu anom? (Ɔkaa dɛm osiandɛ nna Jewfo nye Samariafo nnka.)"
column5: 2 #4.9 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom mmfa iyi nnka ho."

column2: "Jesus buae see no dɛ
column3: Sɛ inyim Nyankopɔn akyɛdze no
column5: Ma me bi monnom yi a
column6: nkyɛ ibebisa no ma ɔaama wo nkwa nsu."

column2: "Ɔbaa no see no dɛ
column3: Owura
column5: na bura no mu so dɔ; hen koraa na ibenya nkwa nsu no?"

column2: "Ana ɔwo eso kyɛn hɛn egya Jakob a ɔkyɛɛ hɛn bura yi
column3: na nankasa nye ne mba nye no mbowa noom bi?"

column2: "Jesus buae see no dɛ
column3: Obiara a ɔbɔnom nsu yi bi no

column2: "Na nyia ɔbɔnom nsu a mebɛma no no
column3: nsukɔm nnkɛdze no da
column4: na nsu a mebɛma no no bɛyɛ no mu nsubura a opuw nsu kɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu."

column2: "Ɔbaa no see no dɛ
column3: Ma me dɛm nsu yi ɛ
column4: amma nsukɔm anndze me ma mammba ammbɔtow nsu yi bi."

column2: "Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Kɔ kɛfrɛ wo kun na bra ha."

column2: "Ɔbaa no buae see no dɛ
column3: Minnyi kun. Jesus see no dɛ

column2: "na nye mbanyin beenum atsena; na nyia enye no wɔ hɔ sesei yi mpo
column3: ɔnnyɛ wo kun bi a; iyi dze

column2: "Ɔbaa no see no dɛ
column3: Mo wura

column2: "Hɛn egyanom sɔree wɔ bepɔw yi do
column3: na hom dze
column4: hom se dɛ Jerusalɛm nye bea a ɔsɛ dɛ nyimpa sɔr wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Ɔbaa
column4: gye me dzi dɛ dɔn no reba a nnyɛ bepɔw yi do
column5: eso nnyɛ Jerusalɛm na hom bɔsɔr Egya no."

column2: "Hom sɔr dza hom nnyim; hɛn dze
column3: yɛsɔr dza yenyim

column2: "Na dɔn no reba
column3: na oenya edu
column4: dɛ hɔn a wɔsɔr nokwar mu no bɔsɔr Egya no wɔ sunsum nye nokwar mu: na iyinom dɛm na Egya no rohwehwɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔsɔr no no yɛ."

column2: "Nyankopɔn yɛ sunsum
column3: na hɔn a wɔsɔr no no
column4: ɔsɛ dɛ wɔsɔr no wɔ sunsum nye nokwar mu."

column2: "Ɔbaa no see no dɛ
column3: Minyim dɛ Messia no (a wɔfrɛ no Kraest no) reba; na ɔnodze
column5: ɔbɛpaa mu aka adze nyina akyerɛ hɛn."

column2: "Jesus buaa no dɛ
column3: Emi a menye wo rekasa yi

column2: "Na ha yi na n’esuafo no bae; na ɔyɛɛ hɔn ahobow dɛ ɔnye ɔbaa no rekasa
column3: naaso obi emmbisa no dɛ
column6: Ɔyɛ dɛn na enye no rekasa yi?"

column2: "Na ɔbaa no gyaa n’ehina no hɔ na osii mu kɔr kurow no mu
column3: na ɔsee kuromba no dɛ
column5: "Hom mbra mbɔhwɛ nyimpa bi a ɔaka dza mayɛ nyina akyerɛ me. Ana nnyɛ oyi nye Kraest no bi a?"

column2: "Nna nyimpa fii kurow no mu dɛ wɔreba ne nkyɛn."
"Na ne ntamu no
column3: n’esuafo no see no dɛ

column2: "Na obuaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Mowɔ edziban midzi a hom nnyim."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi n’esuafo no sesee hɔnho dɛ
column3: Ana obi abrɛ no biribi ma oedzi?"

column2: "Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: M’edziban nye dɛ meyɛ nyia ɔsomaa me no pɛ na muwie n’edwuma."

column2: "Ana hom nnka dɛ aka abosoom anan na twaber edu? Hwɛ! Mese hom dɛ
column3: Hom mma hom enyi do nhwɛ nhaban no
column4: dɛ oenya ahoa dze kyerɛ dɛ edu twaber."

column2: "Na nyia otwa no gye akatua na ɔboaboa aba no ano kɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu
column3: na nyia oduae nye nyia otwae nyina aabɔ mu edzi dɛw."

column2: "Na iyi mu asɛm no yɛ nokwar dɛ obi dua na obi twa."
"Mosomaa hom dɛ hom nkotwa dza hom nnyɛɛ ho edwuma; binom aberɛ hɔnho ayɛ
column3: na hom dze
column4: hom ebedzi hɔn edwuma mu aba."

column2: "Na Samariafo a wɔwɔ kurow yi mu dodowara gyee no dzii wɔ dase a ɔbaa no dzii dɛ
column3: Ɔaka dza mayɛ nyina akyerɛ me no ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Samariafo baa ne nkyɛn no
column3: wɔserɛɛ no dɛ ɔnye hɔn ntsena. Na ɔtsenaa hɔ nda ebien."

column2: "Na nyimpa dodow a ɔkyɛn nkan no gyee no dzii wɔ n’asɛm ntsi
column5: Afei nnyɛ w’asɛm ntsi na yɛgye dzi
column6: na hɛnankasa so yɛatse na yenyim dɛ oyi nye wiadze Agyenkwa no."

column2: "Na nda ebien twaa mu no
column3: ofii hɔ sii mu kɔr Galilii."

column2: "Na Jesus noara gyee dase dɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi nnyi enyidzi wɔ nankasa no kurow mu."
"Na odur Galilii no
column3: Galiliifo gyee no too mu
column4: osiandɛ wohun dza ɔyɛe wɔ Jerusalɛm wɔ afahyɛ no ase nyina; osiandɛ hɔn so kɔr afahyɛ no ase bi."

column2: "Na Jesus baa Kaana a ɔwɔ Galilii mbrɛ ɔdaan nsu wenyin no bio. Na ahenkowaa panyin bi wɔ hɔ a ne ba yar wɔ Karpernaum."
"Na ɔtsee dɛ Jesus fi Judea aba Galilii no
column3: ɔkɔr ne nkyɛn kɛserɛɛ no dɛ ɔmbra mbɛsa ne ba no yarba

column2: "Na Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Sɛ hom ennhu nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze a

column2: "Ɔpanyin no see no dɛ
column3: Mo wura
column4: Sian bra ansaana me ba no ewu."

column2: "Jesus kaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Kɔ
column4: wo ba no atse apɔw.  Na nyimpa no gyee asɛm a Jesus kaa kyerɛɛ no no dzii

column2: "Na ɔresan akɔ no
column3: no nkowaa behyiaa no kaa dɛ ne ba no atse apɔw."

column2: "Na obisaa hɔn dɔn kor a no ho hyɛɛ ase yɛɛ no dzen; na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Ndeda ewiaber dɔnkor no mu na papu no gyaae."

column2: "Na egya no hun dɛ dɔn no ara a Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Wo ba no atse apɔw no mu a

column2: "Iyi so nye asɛnkyerɛdze a otsia ebien a Jesus fi Judea baa Galilii no ɔyɛe."
